name: Tax Time Saver
title: Least Tax Meetings Required
description: In 2020, South African firms had the lowest average number of required meetings with tax officials, with just one meeting needed. This efficiency highlights a streamlined tax process.

name: Debt Dependency
title: High Private Creditor Debt
description: In 2023, South Africa had a significant amount of debt from private creditors, totaling $750 million, indicating a reliance on external financial sources.

name: Late Learners
title: Oldest Lower Secondary School Starters
description: In 2023, South Africa had the highest starting age for lower secondary school at 14 years, which may impact the country's educational progression and workforce readiness.

name: Jobless with Basics
title: High Unemployment Among Basic Educated Males
description: In 2023, 36.179% of South African males with basic education were unemployed, reflecting challenges in job creation for this demographic.

name: Basic Education Blues
title: High Unemployment Among Basic Educated Workforce
description: In 2023, 38.607% of the total labor force with basic education in South Africa was unemployed, indicating a need for more job opportunities and skill development.
